articles.description: Alice Capsey hits a blistering half-century as England beat Sri Lanka by 12 runs in a rain-affected T20 series opener at Hove.
articles.title: Capsey stars as England beat SL in rain-hit T20

articles.description: Andy Murray's hopes of achieving a long-awaited deep run at a Grand Slam are ended by Bulgaria's Grigor Dimitrov in the US Open second round.
articles.title: Murray out of US Open in second round

articles.description: Newcastle United will play Paris St-Germain, Borussia Dortmund and AC Milan in the group stage of the 2023-24 Champions League.
articles.title: Newcastle face PSG on Champions League return

articles.description: Aberdeen must settle for the Europa Conference League group stage this season after a gut-wrenching defeat by Swedish champions BK Hacken in the Europa League play-offs.
articles.title: Aberdeen drop to Conference League after Hacken loss

articles.description: Watch England's impressive batting display as Danni Wyatt hits a boundary-laden 48 from 30 balls and Alice Capsey hits a blistering half-century to secure a 12-run victory over Sri Lanka.
articles.title: Wyatt & Capsey star as England beat Sri Lanka

articles.description: Aston Villa reach the Europa Conference League group stage with a comfortable win over Hibernian.
articles.title: Villa beat Hibs to reach Conference League group stage

articles.description: Hearts' hopes of reaching the Europa Conference League group stage for the second season in a row are brutally extinguished by a rampant PAOK in a one-sided play-off second leg.
articles.title: Hearts hammered by PAOK in play-off exit

articles.description: Gareth Southgate's faith in some England players is admirable, but when does the loyalty become misplaced, asks Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Is Southgate taking loyalty too far?'

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says his decision to sign a new contract with Mercedes was motivated by the fact he and the team have "unfinished business" in Formula 1.
articles.title: Hamilton has 'unfinished business' in F1

articles.description: England head coach Sarina Wiegman dedicates the Uefa women's coach of the year award to Spain's national team.
articles.title: Wiegman dedicates Uefa award to Spain national team
